name: Dizzy  (Ugnaught)
content:
Dizzy was an Ugnaught adrenaline-junkie joyrider active in the Hunters of the Outer Rim tournament at The Arena on the planet Vespaara following the fall of the Galactic Empire. Reveling in roadkill, Dizzy operated a modified droideka named Slingshot. Over the various fights in the tournament, Dizzy and Slingshot gained a rivalry with fellow competitors Utooni. The Jawa brothers targeted Slingshot, whom Dizzy perceived as family.
Dizzy, paired with the droideka Slingshot, is one of the playable characters in the 2022 competitive combat game Star Wars: Hunters, published by Zynga and Lucasfilm Games.
